alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Dickson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 01 at 12:01AM CDT until April 01 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Dickson County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1201 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Dickson, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Dickson, Ashland City, White Bluff, Kingston Springs, Pegram, Burns and Charlotte. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 187 and 191. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
